The radius gets wider @BBCPanorama If the @EnvAgency don‚Äôt end this the whole of the area is going to be sucked into the bog of eternal stench . tweets.text: My 86yr old Mum lives with us, has heart failure & spent the early hours of the past 5 days struggling to breathe & has had no sleep, refusing to call an ambulance. We‚Äôve had enough now, spoke to Alison at EA & asked if anything was being done before someone dies #stopthestink

urls.title: Walleys Quarry Landfill Site - Latest Update - Environment Agency - Citizen Space
urls.description: Find and participate in consultations run by the Environment Agency

tweets.text:
Read the latest update about #WalleysQuarry here üëâ  https://t.co/o558iAVicn
 
We're on site today reviewing the waste @RedIndustries2 has been accepting from yesterday.
 
It's to complete capping of parts of the landfill - work required by the enforcement notice we issued. https://t.co/cWCjwzcYSF

At Health Questions I asked @MattHancock about the public health implications of the breaches at Walley's Quarry.

I know, from both the local GPs and those writing to me, that many residents are concerned for their health, both physically and mentally. @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/pwh6zUI4Zs

urls.title: Water companies illegally dumping sewage in England and Wales' rivers
urls.description: Treatment works are allowed to release sewage into waterways after heavy rain to stop it backing up.

tweets.text:
Rather curiously there hasn't been a single Tweet from the @EnvAgency in the last 24 hours bragging about how they 'Enhance", the environment.

https://t.co/WaaFQXr1lZ

Hey @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 why are the Walleys Quarry odours getting WORSE not BETTER as we approach the EA‚Äôs deadline? We cannot go on living with these levels of gases being released into our community! It‚Äôs so cruel! #stopthestink @MattHancock #Panorama @dpcarrington https://t.co/K9mTTUra1B

tweets.text:

Has news covered this? Surely it‚Äôs a story where questions should be asked of the agency and council? https://t.co/aEgjoNDBUO
Yeah exactly @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids monitor that . Your making people feel like this doesn‚Äôt matter to you https://t.co/ZZ6iizBqMi

We‚Äôve had to leave the area on numerous occasions, if not for being unable to breathe, but for my daughter and unborn baby. Even my manager said how pale I looked today because the gases in my home had me vomiting yet again! @StinkStopthe @sarahbeeny @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/kZbdbnLMLe

tweets.text: From Keele Rd stores to deneside stinking, students walking up Keele Rd with hands over faces, inside stink is unbearable, just asking taped the front door, we can't get out but the stink is still coming into our tomb, still feel ill from last night's exposure @AaronBell4NUL

@SimonTagg @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids Yes, more urgency required.  But what effort, and what actions ?  Neither PHE nor the EA have stirred beyond complacency and platitudes.  Suspend the permit - that‚Äôs the only action that‚Äôs meaningful.
We are grateful to Mr. Tagg and Mr. Bell.

7 hrs ago toxic oil slick stench invaded my home, my head is throbbing despite painkillers, no chance of sleep, house stinks & stench outside is off the scale, why aren't we being evacuated, this is not safe , it's 3.45 am, how can we live wth no air& no sleep, @AaronBell4NUL
